directions: In a medium bowl, toss together the mixed greens, leaf lettuce, cheese and walnuts.  Set aside.
In a small bowl, whisk together the balsamic vinegar, olive oil and lemon juice.   Pour over the salad mixture and toss well.
ingredients: 1 cup leaf lettuce - rinsed, dried and torn into bite-size pieces
title: Balsamic Bleu Cheese Salad
